title: [Large-Scale] Digital Learning Designer Competency Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and grasp of learning design principles
context.additional_context: Development of digital learning content design and production competencies for peer learners through problem-based projects in blended (face-to-face/online) environments

learning_goals: Learners can design digital learning scenarios that solve real educational problems by applying Problem-Based Learning (PBL) methodology.
Learners can create multimodal (text, image, video, programming) digital learning materials for peer learners.
Learners can perform self-directed learning within a teacher-design framework and improve the design process through reflective practice.

resources: Digital Authoring Tools (Canva, H5P, Scratch, etc.)
Online Collaboration Tools (Notion, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
